mapper.select: SELECT iio.org_id,fo.org_name,sum(iio.amount) as item_count,sum(iio.price*iio.amount) as item_price FROM inv_item_onhand iio LEFT JOIN fnd_org fo on fo.org_id = iio.org_id GROUP BY iio.org_id ORDER BY iio.org_id asc limit #{startIndex},#{perPage}
mapper.delete: delete from inv_item_onhand iio where iio.item_id=#{item_id}
